SEARCH
Package controllers

Class AdministratorController

Object
AdministratorController
public class AdministratorController extends Object
The AdministratorController class provides methods for managing and controlling administrative tasks in the system, such as adding/removing staff, approving replenishments, managing stock levels, and viewing appointment records. It interacts with various data storage classes, including staff records, inventory, and appointment records.
